title: Eastman Auto & Power aims turnover of Rs 10,000 cr by FY26
description: Eastman Auto & Power Ltd aims to achieve a turnover of Rs 10,000 crore by 2025-26 through capacity expansion in renewable energy. The company, which posted a turnover of Rs 3,600 crore in 2023-24, plans strategic investments in solar rooftop solutions and Last Mile E-Mobility Solutions. Key appointments have been made to support this growth.
